title: O Crazy Minnal Lyrics Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kanom (2012) Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Andrea Jeremaiah
Song: O Crazy Minnal
Lyrics: Karthik Netha

Movie: Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kanom (2012)
Music: Ved Shankar

O Crazy Minnal, Azhagiya kannil.
Achchangal paravai pola
parandhu pogum vinnil.

Kannaadi kannil, unmugam thaanae
Kanneerai seeni mittai
seidhu vittaai neeye.

Neethaanae kadhal chella ppraani
Nee ponaal vazhai illaithraani

Chill sudarae sudarae yea eeeyae
Nil idarae en manapudhirae
Min-miniyae miniyae yeae eeyae
Yen vazhiye en vazhithunaiye

Idle maavil kolam pottaen
Medical shoppil karuvepilai kaeten
Chockpiece podyil vinmeen paarthaen
Silandhiyin valayil vanavllai kandaen

Adiyil marathadiyil
siru illayaaga irundhaen
Puyalil oru puyalil
ennai nee yaettrinaai

Karayil kadarkarayil, oru suvadaaga irundhaen
Azhayil vellzhayil ennai nee theendinaai
Azhagaaai medhuvaai iyalbaaai

O Crazy Minnal, Azhagiya kannil.
Achchangal paravai pola
parandhu pogum vinnil.

Kannaadi kannil, unmugam thaanae
Kanneerai seeni mittai
seidhu vittaai neeye.

Neethaanae kadhal chella ppraani
Nee ponaal vazhai illaithraani

Aavin paali aanpaal vaasam
Adadaa yeno irul kooda koosum
Kadhal kadhal aahaa mosam
Kaakai yeno kuyil pola pesum

Veyila ? idhu mazhaya ?
idhu rendu ketta nilaya?
Thazhaiva en thazhaiva nee solvaaya ?

Ilayil adhan narambil
orrndhu pogum erumbaai
Uyiril adi uyiril silirthaayae ...

Kalandhaye, niraindhaaye,
Azhagai nee rasithaaye

O Crazy Minnal, Azhagiya kannil.
Achchangal paravai pola
parandhu pogum vinnil.

Kannaadi kannil, unmugam thaanae
Kanneerai seeni mittai
seidhu vittaai neeye.

Neethaanae kadhal chella ppraani
Nee ponaal vazhai illaithraani

Chill sudarae sudarae yea eeeyae
Nil idarae en manapudhirae
Min-miniyae miniyae yeae eeyae
Yen vazhiye en vazhithunaiye
